content.text: Hey, I'm (user 1's name). What's your name?
Hi, I'm (user 2's name). It's nice to meet you!
It's nice to meet you too! What do you do for fun?
I like to go out to eat with my friends, watch movies, and play video games.
I like to do those things too! What's your favorite food?
My favorite food is pizza. I love how it can be customized to whatever you want.
Me too! I love pizza. What's your favorite pizza topping?
I like pepperoni and pineapple. It's a weird combination, but I love it.
That's a unique combination. I've never had it, but I'm willing to try it.
You should! It's really good.
I'll have to try it sometime. What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play action games, like Call of Duty and Fortnite. I also like to play puzzle games, like Portal and The Witness.
I like action games too. I've been playing a lot of Elden Ring lately. It's a really challenging game, but it's a lot of fun.
I've heard good things about Elden Ring. I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
It sounds like we have a lot in common. We should get together sometime and play some video games.
That would be fun! I'm free on Friday night.
Me too! I'll bring pizza.
Sounds like a plan!
Great! I'll text you my address.
